::: {.cell}

The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: M2.2.web.orig v2.0.


> Indicative distributions of these marine pelagic ecosystem functional groups were derived from bathymetric spatial data obtained from Becker et al. (2009) using depth range thresholds cited in respective descriptive profiles for each functional group. Occurrences were mapped at 30 arc second spatial resolution..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090914))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**M2.2 Mesopelagic ocean water**](/efg-info/M2_2.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Indicative Map (**code: M2.2.IM.orig**, version v2.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: M2.2.web.orig**, version v2.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

M2.2.IM.orig (v2.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/M2.2.IM.orig_v2.0.tif)
M2.2.web.orig (v2.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/M2.2.web.orig_v2.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090914) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
